title: Jeff J Hunter - Build An Iconic Brand With The CORE Branding Method
itunes:title: Jeff J Hunter - Build An Iconic Brand With The CORE Branding Method
description:
If you want to build an iconic brand, then you’ll want to learn the CORE Branding Method created by Jeff J Hunter.
 
Jeff J Hunter is the creator of the CORE Branding Method to Build Iconic Brands who is a contributor to Forbes, and has been featured on ABC, Entrepreneur, CBS & INC.
 
A bunch of guys on the internet are full of shit. Jeff isn’t one of those guys. I’ve watched this dude blow his personal brand up over the years. I don’t think you speak on the same stage as Gary Vee if you’re full of shit.
 
In this episode, you’ll learn the exact steps, actionable steps, to build an iconic brand using the CORE Branding Method.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/156
 
Get More Involved:

  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
